name: NinjaRun
description:
Run to the next Sushi Bar risking your life doing parkour on proceduraly generated pagodas.
Disclaimer: this is a SOLO ONLY experience.

Rules
- Press any key to jump.
- You can land on descending slopes to gain a speed boost.

Programming - Rémi Bismuth
Graphics - Jéremy Forveille
Sounds & music - Maxime Ferrieu
